r.s: A full featured command line options and arguments parser
r.d:
Console_CommandLine is a full featured package for managing command-line options and arguments highly inspired from python optparse module, it allows the developer to easily build complex command line interfaces.
Main features: * handles sub commands (ie. $ myscript.php -q subcommand -f file), * can be completely built from an xml definition file, * generate --help and --version options automatically, * can be completely customized, * builtin support for i18n, * and much more...
r.n: Bugfix release: * fixed bug #16848: Trailing spaces in quoted argument are truncated, * fixed bug #16849: Replaced $_GET by $_REQUEST to handle POST correctly, * fixed bug #16850: Parse9 test (password) fails (on windows), * fixed bug #16914: Password action now operates as expected when it is the last parameter or the last parameter before a command, * displayUsage() should output to stdout instead of stderr, * added the possibility to pass "false" as exitCode to the display*() methods to prevent exit() calls, * fixed some typos in code comments.
